question: The Competition Commission of India (CCI) approved acquisition of Bharti AXA General Insurance Company by which company?
explanation:
The Competition Commission of India (CCI) approved acquisition of Bharti AXA General Insurance Company by ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company.
As per the Ministry of Corporate Affairs, the approval has been given under the Competition Act, 2002. Bharti AXA is a joint venture held by Bharti General Ventures Private Limited (51%) and Societe Beaujon (49%).
